name: The Weekly Reset
description: Reflection & Planning - Close out the previous week and intentionally design the week ahead

onSelect.message: Ready for your weekly reset? Let's look at the big picture together! 🗓️

onStart.message: Time to zoom out and look at the big picture.

onComplete.message: Great job reviewing your week, [User]! You're all set for success. 🚀

onSave.message: Week reset complete! You're setting yourself up for success 🌟

sections.title: Weekly Wins
sections.placeholder: Add your biggest achievements and best moments from this week...

onStart.message: Let's celebrate your wins! What went well this week? 🎉

onComplete.message: Look at all these wins! You should be proud! 💫

hints: Big or small - all wins count!
What made you feel accomplished?
What progress did you make toward your goals?
What moments brought you joy?

3.message: Three wins already! You had a good week! 🎯

sections.title: Challenges & Lessons
sections.placeholder: Reflect on what didn't go as planned and what you learned...

suggested_questions: What did I learn from it?
What challenge taught me the most?
How did I grow from this difficulty?

onStart.message: Let's reflect on the tough parts. Growth happens here 🌱

onComplete.message: These lessons are valuable! You're turning challenges into wisdom 💎

onSkip.message: A smooth week? That's wonderful! Keep that momentum! 🎉

hints: Be honest but kind to yourself
Every challenge contains a lesson
What would you tell a friend in this situation?
How can this make you stronger?

3.message: This level of reflection shows real growth! 💪

sections.title: Start, Stop, Continue
sections.placeholder: What behaviors should you start, stop, or continue doing next week?

onStart.message: Time to design your next week! What needs to change? 🔄

onComplete.message: You're taking control of your habits! Intentional living! 🎯

hints: START: What new habit would serve you?
STOP: What's holding you back?
CONTINUE: What's already working?
Be specific and actionable

3.message: You're being intentional about your choices! 💫

5.message: This clarity will transform your week! 🚀

sections.title: Top 3 Priorities
sections.placeholder: List the three most important tasks for the upcoming week...

onStart.message: If you could only accomplish 3 things, what would they be? 🎯

onComplete.message: Three clear priorities! You're set up for a focused week! 💪

hints: What will have the biggest impact?
What aligns with your long-term goals?
What would make you feel accomplished?
Be specific about what 'done' looks like

1.message: Good first priority! What else matters? 🎯

2.message: Two down, one more! Almost there! 💫

sections.title: Personal Focus
sections.placeholder: What is one thing you will do next week just for yourself?

onStart.message: Don't forget about YOU! What will you do for yourself? 💜

onComplete.message: Self-care is essential! You deserve this time for yourself! 🌸

hints: What would recharge your energy?
What brings you joy outside of work/obligations?
What have you been putting off for yourself?
How will you nurture your own wellbeing?

50.message: This commitment to self-care is beautiful! 🌟
